mapper.select: SELECT a.id ,a.exportType ,a.newsType ,a.newsSourceId ,a.newsTransferId ,a.paperPublishTime ,a.appPublishTime ,CASE a.newsType WHEN 'TEXT' THEN '文字稿' WHEN 'IMAGE' THEN '图片稿' WHEN 'AUDIOANDVIDEO' THEN '音视频' ELSE '' END AS newsTypeLabel ,a.pageName ,a.category ,a.paperTitle ,a.appTitle ,CASE WHEN NOT ISNULL(asra.percent) THEN asra.author ELSE a.author END AS author ,a.editor ,a.wordCount ,a.url ,(SELECT SUM(acc.clickCount) FROM t_article_click_count acc WHERE acc.title = a.appTitle) AS clickCount ,asr.scoreId AS asr_scoreId ,asr.score AS asr_score ,asr.remark AS asr_remark ,IFNULL(ROUND(asra.percent/100 * asr.score, 2), asr.score) AS authorScore FROM t_article a LEFT JOIN t_article_score_record asr ON asr.newsTransferId = a.newsTransferId LEFT JOIN t_article_score_record_author asra ON asra.scoreRecordId = asr.id
